subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jurgen Klinsmann’s exclusion of Landon Donovan from the United States World Cup roster was a bold decision by a coach who knows what the future holds for him.
snippet: Jurgen Klinsmann’s exclusion of Landon Donovan from the United States World Cup roster was a bold decision by a coach who knows what the future holds for him.
